name: emi.storm
description:
The StoRM service is a storage resource manager for generic disk based storage systems separating the

data management layer from the underlying storage systems.
releaseNotes:
StoRM-Front-End

    * What's new

          o First storm-frontend-server release in EMI. Previous releases are available via INFN-Grid

          o Fixed bug 107 (GGUS 70934)

    * Installation and configuration

          o To install storm-frontend-server, install its metapackage RPM: emi-storm-frontend-server-mp

          o To configure storm-frontend-server use yaim on node se_storm_frontend. A good explanation of the required YAIM variable is available in /opt/glite/yaim/examples/siteinfo/services/se_storm_frontend

    * Known issues

          o None



StoRM-Back-end-Server

    * What's new

          o First storm-backend-server release in EMI. Previous releases are available via INFN-Grid

          o tape support (features usable in combination with GEMSS, based on GPFS and TSM)

          o sanity check at service startup

          o http(s) file transfer protocol support

          o Fixed bug 109 ((GGUS 68230)

          o Fixed bug 106 (GGUS 65155)

    * Installation and configuration

          o To install storm-backend-server, install its metapackage RPM: emi-storm-backend-server-mp

          o To configure storm-backend-server use yaim on node se_storm_backend. A good explanation of the required YAIM variable is available in /opt/glite/yaim/examples/siteinfo/services/se_storm_backend

          o If you configure other services with yaim on the same host always specify also se_storm_backend node

    * Known issues : None



StoRM-GridFTP-Server

    * What's new

          o First storm-gridfts-server release in EMI. Previous releases are available via INFN-Grid

          o Fixed bug 108 (GGUS 70751)

    * Installation and configuration

          o To install storm-gridftp-server, install its metapackage RPM: emi-storm-gridftp-server-mp

          o To configure storm-gridftp-server use yaim on node se_storm_gridftp. A good explanation of the required YAIM variable is available in /opt/glite/yaim/examples/siteinfo/services/se_storm_gridftp

          o The service needs to be installed on a machine on which storm file system is mounted.

    * Known issues

          o None



StoRM-GridHTTPS-Server

    * What's new

          o First storm-gridhttps-server release.

          o The storm gridhttps service is responsible to provide access to storm managed files via http and https protocol.

          o It is able to manage plain requests and requests over SSL using an x509 certificate or an x509 certificate with VOMS extensions.

          o For the requests providing a valid x509 certificate file access priviledges are verified in respect to the certificate owner and (if available) his FQANS.

    * Installation and configuration

          o To install storm-gridhttps-server install its metapackage RPM: emi-storm-gridhttps-mp

          o To configure storm-gridhttps-server use yaim on node se_storm_gridhttps. A good explanation of the required YAIM variable is available in /opt/glite/yaim/examples/siteinfo/services/se_storm_gridhttps

          o The service uses ports 8443 and (by default) 8080, so open them on your firewall.

          o The service needs to be installed on a machine on which storm file system is mounted.

    * Known issues

          o None



StoRM-SRM-Client

    * What's new

          o First storm-srm-client release in EMI. Previous releases are available via INFN-Grid

    * Installation and configuration

          o To install storm-srm-client, install its metapackage RPM: emi-storm-srm-client-mp

    * Known issues

          o None
